articles.title: Maduro-backed Venezuelan legislator calls elections council main priority
articles.description: A Venezuelan lawmaker sworn in by the ruling socialist party as the new head of parliament said on Monday that naming a new electoral council to preside over free and fair elections was the body's main priority.
articles.content:
CARACAS (Reuters) - A Venezuelan lawmaker sworn in by the ruling socialist party as the new head of parliament said on Monday that naming a new electoral council to preside over free and fair elections was the body’s main priority.

articles.title: Argentina boosts security at airports, U.S. embassy over Iran tensions

articles.description: Several helicopters could be heard flying over Baghdad on Sunday night, and a letter from the U.S.-led coalition to the Iraqi military seen by Reuters said it would be using helicopters to reposition its troops.
articles.content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Several helicopters could be heard flying over Baghdad on Sunday night, and a letter from the U.S.-led coalition to the Iraqi military seen by Reuters said it would be using helicopters to reposition its troops.

articles.author: Natalia A. Ramos Miranda
articles.title: Chilean university admissions tests hit by fresh protests
articles.description: University entrance exams to be taken by 300,000 students around Chile were disrupted in some cities on Monday by fresh protests over inequality and elitism, with some students blocking access to test sites and burning exam papers.
articles.content:
By Natalia A. Ramos Miranda

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Warren secures endorsement from ex-rival Castro
articles.description: 2020 presidential candidate Elizabeth Warren won the backing on Monday of former rival Julian Castro, putting the only Latino candidate in the 2020 Democratic field on her side just weeks ahead of the first nominating contest. Colette Luke has more.
articles.content:
Posted 
2020 presidential candidate Elizabeth Warren won the backing on Monday of former rival Julian Castro, putting the only Latino candidate in the 2020 Democratic field on her side just weeks ahead of the first nominating contest. Colette Luke has more.

articles.content:
HOUSTON, Jan 6 (Reuters) - A flotilla of oil tankers is sailing empty from Europe and the Mediterranean toward the U.S. Gulf Coast to take advantage of surging shipping rates, according to shipping sources and Refinitiv Eikon data.
